lines.text: Curt, did you really spend the last of our money on this incredibly cheap champagne?
No. You spent the last of our money on that incredibly cheap dress.
I like what you've done with the room.
I haven't done anything to it.
Mr. Taylor, you must have a certain flair for fashion; tell me, does this tie go with this jacket?
Absolutely. And it... brings out the turquoise in your eyes.
You must admit, it bears a certain resemblance to what I told Rick last week?
